overview: Sexy career-woman Michelle "brings home the bacon," but lesbian housewife Zoey is too tired and depressed to "fry it up in the pan." Concerned, Michelle suggests they hire a babysitter so they can have more time together, and Zoe opts for hot young teenager Kasey Chase. But Kasey is a lesbian with a taste for older women, and she soon sets her sights on the sensitive, lonely Zoey. Can Michelle stop her lover from being seduced by a hot, romantically-delusional teen?
title: Lesbian Babysitters 3
